text: Cheryl Studer (born October 24, 1955) is a soprano singer. She has done over eighty roles from dramatic repertoire into lyric soprano. She began in the late 1970s. She has won two Grammy Awards. Studer was born in Midland, Michigan. ==References== Category:People from Midland, Michigan Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Grammy Award winners Category:American opera singers Category:Singers from Michigan Category:Sopranos
title: Cheryl Studer
